DataElement.preferredName: Diagnostic Electrocardiogram 12 Lead Placement Performed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date on which a diagnostic, 12-lead (placement unspecified) electrocardiogram was performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a diagnostic electrocardiogram performed._A procedure which records the electrical current in the heart in the form of a continuous strip graph. The electrocardiography results may determine whether the heart is performing normally or suffering from abnormalities, may indicate coronary artery blockages, can be used for detecting calcium, magnesium and other electrolyte disturbances, allow the detection of conduction abnormalities, indicate the physical shape of a patient during stress test and provide information on the physical condition of the heart._An electrocardiogram (ECG) lead placement whereby 12 leadpoints are recorded but the position of the leads is unspecified._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Characteristic or indicative of a condition.: A procedure which records the electrical current in the heart in the form of a continuous strip graph. The electrocardiography results may determine whether the heart is performing normally or suffering from abnormalities, may indicate coronary artery blockages, can be used for detecting calcium, magnesium and other electrolyte disturbances, allow the detection of conduction abnormalities, indicate the physical shape of a patient during stress test and provide information on the physical condition of the heart.

Concepts.definition: Characteristic or indicative of a condition.
A procedure that displays the electrical activity of the heart.

Property.preferredDefinition: An electrocardiogram (ECG) lead placement whereby 12 leadpoints are recorded but the position of the leads is unspecified.:Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: An electrocardiogram (ECG) lead placement whereby 12 leadpoints are recorded but the position of the leads is unspecified.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for ABTC 1302 study in Rave per request by J.Fisher. mc 4/9/14

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
